processor.name: Subscriptions
processor.description:
Used for subscribing newly created accounts (ADD only) to any subscriptions that they might inherit from a template specified by thier nearest ancestor, if such a template exists.
In order for a session to be processed by this plug-in the following session variables must be set as indicated:
AccountType must allow the account to be subscribable ... i.e b_cansubscribe be true. ActionType must be set to either ACCOUNT or BOTH. ApplyAccountTemplate must be set to TRUE. Operation must be set to ADD.
Otherwise the session will be ignored by this plug-in.
AccountID, AncestorAccountID and CorporateAccountID must all be set in the session. AccountEndDate and AccountStartDate are optional and default values will be used if they are not set in the session.
processor.condition:
CREATE PROCEDURE condition @_ExecutePlugin BOOLEAN OUTPUT, @Operation ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com','Operation')$, @b_cansubscribe BOOLEAN, @ApplyAccountTemplate BOOLEAN, @ActionType ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com/accountcreation','ActionType')$, @b_CanParticipateInGSub BOOLEAN AS IF ( ((@b_cansubscribe = TRUE) OR (@b_CanParticipateInGSub = TRUE)) AND (@ApplyAccountTemplate = TRUE) AND ((upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'ACCOUNT') OR (upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'BOTH')) AND (@Operation = #metratech.com/Operation/Add#) )
SET @_ExecutePlugin = TRUE
ELSE SET @_ExecutePlugin = FALSE
